title: YouTube Music smart downloads drop the lightning for some sparkles
content:
YouTube Music has long been able to automatically download songs “based on your previous listening history” so that you always have a fresh collection of things to listen to when offline. A small YouTube Music tweak sees smart downloads get a new sparkle icon.

more…

The post YouTube Music smart downloads drop the lightning for some sparkles appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A small tweak sees YouTube Music's smart downloads capability get a new sparkle icon to replace the old lightning bold that's been...
